org.ldaptive.io

Class GeneralizedTimeValueTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.io.AbstractStringValueTranscoder<Calendar>
      • org.ldaptive.io.GeneralizedTimeValueTranscoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueTranscoder<Calendar>

    public class GeneralizedTimeValueTranscoder
extends AbstractStringValueTranscoder<Calendar>
    Decodes and encodes a generalized time for use in an ldap attribute value. See http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4517#section-3.3.13

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  GeneralizedTimeValueTranscoder.FractionalPart
      Describes the fractional part of a generalized time string.

        Returns:
